alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 19 at 9:25PM CDT until May 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. .Water levels continue to drop through Minor Flood stage reaching Action Stage early next week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...Until late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 804.5 feet, Backup at Reach 2 Dike, cemetery road at 6th St S. Shut storm valve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 804.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Thursday was 805.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 799.8 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
